title: Hello Minecraft! 开服器 怎么用        怎么开服
author: wpas
txt_content: {:10_493:}告诉我   告诉我  告诉我

replies.author: Cookie丶B
replies.txt_content:
开服器文件编辑输入：
@ECHO OFF
java -Xms1g -Xmx1g -jar mcpc-plus-1.6.4-R2.1-forge965-B251.jar
pause

replies.author: wpas
2014丶小皇帝
replies.txt_content: 先端口映射吧 少年！  然后下载服务端
